paragraphs.content: Praise ye the LORD. Blessed is the man that feareth the LORD, that delighteth greatly in his commandments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Praise ye the Lord. Blessed is the man that feareth the Lord, that delighteth greatly in his commandments.

paragraphs.content: His seed shall be mighty upon earth: the generation of the upright shall be blessed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: His seed shall be mighty upon earth: the generation of the upright shall be blessed.

paragraphs.content: Wealth and riches shall be in his house: and his righteousness endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wealth and riches shall be in his house: and his righteousness endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: Unto the upright there ariseth light in the darkness: he is gracious, and full of compassion, and righteous.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Unto the upright there ariseth light in the darkness: he is gracious, and full of compassion, and righteous.

paragraphs.content: A good man sheweth favour, and lendeth: he will guide his affairs with discretion.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A good man sheweth favour, and lendeth: he will guide his affairs with discretion.

paragraphs.content: Surely he shall not be moved for ever: the righteous shall be in everlasting remembrance.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Surely he shall not be moved for ever: the righteous shall be in everlasting remembrance.

paragraphs.content: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the Lord.

paragraphs.content: His heart is established, he shall not be afraid, until he see his desire upon his enemies.
paragraphs.contentHtml: His heart is established, he shall not be afraid, until he see his desire upon his enemies.

paragraphs.content: He hath dispersed, he hath given to the poor; his righteousness endureth for ever; his horn shall be exalted with honour.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He hath dispersed, he hath given to the poor; his righteousness endureth for ever; his horn shall be exalted with honour.

paragraphs.content: The wicked shall see it, and be grieved; he shall gnash with his teeth, and melt away: the desire of the wicked shall perish.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The wicked shall see it, and be grieved; he shall gnash with his teeth, and melt away: the desire of the wicked shall perish.
